Issue.creator: burdettadam
Issue.summary: Clone on a double-reference in sdk
Issue.description: src/services/wallet/storage/default/mod.rs:299:53 | 299 | let type_ = if options.retrieve_type { Some(type_.clone()) } else { None }; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: # deny(clone_double_ref) on by default = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang-nursery.github.io/rust-clippy/v0.0.211/index.html#clone_double_ref help: try dereferencing it | 299 | let type_ = if options.retrieve_type { Some(&(*type_).clone()) } else { None }; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: or try being explicit about what type to clone | 299 | let type_ = if options.retrieve_type { Some(& u8 ::clone(type_)) } else { None }; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ {code} >
